item.description: We know you're dying to sit in a dark room with fellow design dorks. OK, that's creepy, but seriously, bring your popcorn: we're going to the movies, baby! The BSA Emerging Professionals Network and Metropolis magazine co-host a screening of Brilliant Simplicity, a new short film that traces the many ways breakthroughs can happen in a design practice, on Tuesday, September 22 at 6:00 pm at Shepley Bulfinch (2 Seaport Lane, Boston). After the film, Metropolis editor-in-chief Susan Szenasy leads a conversation on the pressing need for research in design. The event costs $12 ($6 for BSA members) and includes refreshments. Learn more and register online at www.architects.org/movie.
item.name: Metropolis Movie Screening at SBRA!
